void: ^In the cosmic aftermath, Syviis, now a posthumous whisper, witnessed the erasure of their essence.
void1: ^The Great Mother's decree wiped away not just their being but every cherished memory. Even Lyra, once a part of their luminescent world, now haunted by a ghost who was never there.
void2: ^The town square, once vibrant with memories, lay untouched, spotless. Syviis, now an echo in the celestial symphony, will observe the void they left behind.
void3: ^Forever echoing though Luminescira in the form of Eldervitalis, for use of the Mother.
